About this item

  • High Image Quality: A compact, lightweight RF mount video camera featuring a 24.2 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor for stunning image clarity and detail
  • Powerful Image Processor: The DIGIC X Image Processor makes this cinema camera great for movies and vlogging; these digital cameras even connect to your smartphone
  • High-Speed Shooting: Capture fast action with this social media camera, featuring up to 12 fps using Electronic First Curtain and up to 15 fps with Electronic Shutter; Use Movie for Close-up Demo Mode to quickly switch focus when an item is brought close
  • Auto Focus Camera: Dual Pixel CMOS AF covering up to 100% x 100% area with 651 AF zones with auto subject detection and tracking of people, animals and vehicles
  • Superior Viewing Experience: With 4K uncropped movie with Dual Pixel CMOS AF II at up to 30 fps oversampled from 6K and Full HD High-Frame rate movie at up to 120 fps, these mirrorless cameras make a perfect addition to your home office supplies

Product description

Capture the moment just as you imagine it with the compact and lightweight EOS R50. Intuitive photo functions capture beautiful images automatically, making photography fun, simple, and convenient. Featuring a 24.2-megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor and DIGIC X processor, this content creator camera lets you capture image in stunning clarity and level of detail. A host of video camera functions such as 6K oversampled uncropped 4K movie at up to 30 fps and Dual Pixel CMOS AF II makes the EOS R50 a great 4K camera for video recording and vlogging. Plus, the camera boasts auto subject tracking, including animal, people, and vehicle tracking via deep learning technology, making focusing more reliable than ever. Smartphone-like operability and connectivity makes this an ideal entry-level camera. For rapid continuous shooting, the choice is yours — capture memorable moments at 12 fps with electronic first curtain shutter, or switch up to 15 fps when using silent electronic shutter. Enjoy a full view with zero distractions thanks to this camera's Clear View LCD II vari-angle touchscreen. This 4K digital camera lets you choose your favourite effect by offering an expanded array of auto-compatible scenes. Get inspired, and let Creative Assist and Advanced A+ do the work for you. The versatility and small size of the RF-S18-45mm F4.5-6.3 IS STM lens gives you the flexibility you desire without taking up your whole camera bag.

From the manufacturer

Capture the Moment Just as You Imagine It

The EOS R50 camera makes photography fun, simple, and convenient with intuitive photo functions that capture beautiful images automatically, just as you imagine them. A host of video functions such as 6K oversampled 4K 30p capture and Dual Pixel CMOS AF II makes the EOS R50 a great camera for movie recording and vlogging as well. The 24.2 Megapixel APS-C size CMOS Image sensor and DIGIC X image processor ensure high image quality in a compact and lightweight form factor.

24.2 Megapixel (APS-C) CMOS Sensor

Equipped with a 24.2-million-pixel CMOS (APS-C) image sensor & DIGIC X Image Processor, the EOS R50 camera can capture images & videos with reduced noise, delivering clear, detailed results even in low light. Images look beautiful even when enlarged, with natural bokeh that smartphones can’t offer.

Dual Pixel CMOS AF II

Easily keep track of your subject with Dual Pixel CMOS AF II – a highly responsive system that covers up to approximately 100% x 100% of the picture area, breaking the image into up to 651 automatically-selected AF zones during Whole Area AF.

Previous page

  1. Automatic Subject Detection and Tracking

    The EOS R50 camera can automatically select & track the subject, enabling photography that keeps them in focus with ease. Developed using Deep Learning Technology, subjects are detectable (1,2).

  2. Continuous Shooting

    Capture those can’t-miss moments with up to 12 frames per second continuous shooting using the Electronic First Curtain shutter mode, and up to 15 frames per second with Electronic Shutter mode.

  3. Advanced A+ Assist

    Experience the joy of creative photography with an expanded array of auto-compatible scenes. Advanced A+ Assist enables great imagery even in difficult settings such as night and backlit scenarios.

Next page

Vlogging Made Simple and Convenien

With video recording features such as 6K oversampled uncropped 4K movie at up to 30 fps, Full-HD High-frame rate movie recording at up to 120 fps, Dual Pixel CMOS AF tracking, and Movie for Close-up Demo Mode, the EOS R50 camera makes vlogging and video content creation simple and convenient.

The EOS R50 camera can continuously record video for up to 1 hour, allowing you to set up your video and keep your vlog, podcast, or other video project rolling without worrying about it stopping (3).

Movie for Close-Up Demos Mode

Quickly switch focus from the on-camera subject to an object that is presented towards the camera’s lens.

Vertical Movie Mode

Movie rotation information can be set during or after movie recording, allowing videos to be played in vertical composition when viewing on a phone.

Vari-Angle Touchscreen LCD

Featuring a 3.0-inch, 1.62 million dot Clear View LCD II Vari-angle Touchscreen LCD, the EOS R50 makes it easy to compose and shoot from any angle.

Precise Electronic Viewfinder

Equipped with a high-precision 0.39-inch OLED (Organic Light-Emitting Diode) EVF with approx. 2.36 million dots and a 22mm eyepoint.

UVC Livestreaming

UVC/UAC compatibility allows the EOS R50 camera to be used as a web camera to stream live video in Full HD 30 fps fixed, without additional computer software, to applications such as Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Skype, and similar on-line web conferencing software(4).

Wired and Wireless Communications

The EOS R50 camera supports both wired and wireless connections to your smartphone via its USB Type-C(4) port, built-in Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth technology, making it easy to upload and share movies and photos to your favorite social networks.

Built-in Bluetooth Capability

Bluetooth pairing helps you connect the camera to compatible smart devices using the free Canon Camera Connect app. This low-energy wireless connection helps preserve battery life, while providing remote control of the camera. It also sends continuously updated GPS location data from your phone, letting you geotag what you've captured so you know precisely where you captured the photo.

Built-in Wi-Fi Capability

Enable wireless functions, such as remote live view, file viewing and transfer, by connecting to Wi-Fi quickly and seamlessly. Using the Canon Camera Connect app, you can also transfer files to your mobile device to browse and share on social media.

USB-C Connection

The EOS R50 camera can be connected to a computer or smartphone via USB-C(4). All Canon Camera Connect app features that can be used with Wi-Fi are now available when the camera and smartphone are connected via USB, using a compatible cable for your device.

Disclaimers

(1) Effectiveness varies depending on the subject. In some cases, dogs, cats or birds may not be detected, while some animals other than dogs, cats or birds may be detected.

(2) Some vehicles may not be detected depending on condition in some cases. In addition, the camera may detect entity as vehicle other than cars, motorcycles, trains, and airplanes for tracking.

(3) Up to 15 minutes at 119.88/100.00 fps. Video may stop due to battery level, card capacity, or temperature.

(4) A compatible cable is required for wired USB communication (not included).

How are ratings calculated?
To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzes reviews to verify trustworthiness.

  • WVF
    1.0 out of 5 stars it cost you $60 extra to get a working hot shoe
    Reviewed in Canada on December 19, 2024
    Verified Purchase
    I could still give 4 stars, but then your wouldn't be here, reading this (but it is important):

    Canon's new hot shoe is fully compatible with any standard accessory - as long you are not using it. For the flash that you bought 10 years ago and still use, because the hot shoe is supposed to guarantee compatibility since the 1950s.

    But in 2024, everyone wants to have more of your money than you can ever imagine, and comes up with the weirdest tricks to dig deeper in your pocket.

    You can't buy software anymore, you have to subscribe to it. You can't refill your ink and toner tanks anymore, you need to buy new ones - of course with a chip that makes sure no aftermarket product will be recognized by your printer.

    And now, the newest trick from Canon: The Multi-Function hot shoe. Just adding new functions wouldn't be smart enough, because then people could still use their older or 3rd party accessories. Canon removed the standard firing pin. The thing that makes a hot shoe a "hot" shoe. For any 3rd party or older equipment, Canon's new shoe is only a cold socket to hold something in place, but does not provide any function. Canada forces you to spend $60 on an extra piece of plastic with a few contacts, to get your firing pin back.
    Read more

  • ARI
    5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, and picture quality is amazing
    Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2024
    Verified Purchase
    Years ago I purchased an expensive Sony camera and had issues with it right away. It was complicated to figure out and sat on my shelf untouched for 5 years. I didn’t like the picture quality and felt like I could never get clear photos and the color was not great.
    So I’ve Been using my smartphone for years but finally decided to try another camera.
    After watching 1000 YouTube videos finally decided on the Canon r50 because I wanted something I could use for videos, vlogging, and also for photography.
    This was my first time using it, and I got amazing pictures right off the bat. My love for photography is rekindled, with no stress added!
    The camera uses AI for the autofocus and automatically blurs the background and focuses on subjects in your frame. That was important to me because I take a lot of close up pictures .
    The kit lens is taking amazing photos and is good for close up photography. I thought (after watching numerous YouTube videos) that the kit lens was “trash” and I’d need to immediately buy another lens but I am pleasantly surprised on the quality of pictures I’m getting from it!
    All of the different modes are easy to use and fun to experiment with.
    The colors on the camera are amazing and it’s easy to transfer the pictures to your phone via Bluetooth.
    You will need to buy an SD card right Away, and I also purchased a screen protector so I don’t worry about touching the screen.
    It was definitely worth the I vestment for me and a huge upgrade from my smartphone.
